declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Module where { Module_ID <o> @Search:Module_ID and } { Module_Name <o> @Search:Module_Name and } { Module_ParentID <o> @Search:Module_ParentID and } 1 = 1 ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Module_ID] ,[Module_ParentID] ,[Module_Name] ,[Module_IsHeader] ,case when [Module_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Module_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Module_ID] ,[Module_ParentID] ,[Module_Name] ,[Module_IsHeader] ,[Module_A] from wcms_Module where { Module_ID <o> @Search:Module_ID and } { Module_Name <o> @Search:Module_Name and } { Module_ParentID <o> @Search:Module_ParentID and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
